Democrat Kathleen Murphy: s claim that the NRA supported background checks after the tragedy of 9-11.
Confirmation from Morgan Finkelstein: spokeswoman for the Democratic Party of Virginia, that Murphy made a mistake and meant to say the NRA supported background checks after the 1999 shootings at Columbine High School.
Murphy: s prompt removal of the incorrect statement from her website and subsequent replacement with the accurate statement about the NRA supporting background checks after the tragedy at Columbine High School.
NRA executive vice president Wayne LaPie: s congressional testimony in 1999, where he expressed support for mandatory instant criminal background checks for every sale at every gun show and closing the Hinckley loophole.
